From: The BigCommerce Team Subject: Join us for the April Town Hall To: {{lead.Email Address}} Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We’re excited to invite you to our April BigCommerce Town Hall. During this monthly conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at recent platform enhancements and what’s coming up next. BigCommerce Town Hall <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/1056162656249718786]]> When: April 28, 2016 from 2-3pm CT What: A discussion of BigCommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A with CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team. Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team
Reserve your spot <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/1056162656249718786]]> We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community discussion <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/group/0F913000000HLTBCA4?t=1461271876897]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/article/BigCommerce-Town-Halls?t=1461271876897]]> and Partner Portal. Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
